articles.content: On his 7.25 acre (3 hectare) plot off a highway south of Indianapolis, Baker's collection of spiky antennae pointing in various directions allows him to make transmissions across the US and much furt… [+2226 chars]

articles.title: Quantum Leap: Physicists Successfully Simulate Super Diffusion - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Quantum physicists at Trinity, working alongside IBM Dublin, have successfully simulated super diffusion in a system of interacting quantum particles on a quantum computer. This is the first step in doing highly challenging quantum transport calculations on q…
articles.content: Quantum physicists have simulated super diffusion in quantum particles on a quantum computer, paving the way for deeper insights into condensed matter physics and materials science. This achievement,… [+5778 chars]

articles.title: Gene-Editing Breakthrough: Compact Enzyme Promises More Effective Treatments - SciTechDaily
